description.en:
This task type requires the player to get certain items. 
If you have a newer version of RecipeViewer enabled, you can click or long press the icon above to view the recipe.
For this task, the player needs to get 20 oak planks.
description.ru:
This task type requires the player to get certain items. 
If you have a newer version of RecipeViewer enabled, you can click or long press the icon above to view the recipe.
For this task, the player needs to get 20 oak planks.
description.zh:
该任务类型需要玩家获得特定物品。
如果你启用了较新版本的RecipeViewer，你可以点击或长按上面的图标以查看配方。
对于该任务，需要玩家获得20个橡木木板。

description.en: For this task, players are required to submit 16 planks.
description.ru: For this task, players are required to submit 16 planks.
description.zh: 对于该任务，需要玩家提交16个木板。

description.en:
This reward type gives the player specific items. 
If you have a newer version of RecipeViewer enabled, you can click or long press the icon above to view the recipe.
For this reward, the player will be given 3 sticks when claiming it. 
In addition, the reward is automatically claimed.
description.ru:
This reward type gives the player specific items. 
If you have a newer version of RecipeViewer enabled, you can click or long press the icon above to view the recipe.
For this reward, the player will be given 3 sticks when claiming it. 
In addition, the reward is automatically claimed.
description.zh:
该奖励类型给予玩家特定物品。
如果你启用了较新版本的RecipeViewer，你可以点击或长按上面的图标以查看配方。
对于该奖励，在领取时会给玩家3个木棍。
另外，该奖励自动领取。

description.en: For this reward, the player will be given 20 oak planks when claimed.
description.ru: For this reward, the player will be given 20 oak planks when claimed.
description.zh: 对于该奖励，在领取时会给玩家20个橡木木板。
